text: Erica Faye Watson (February 26, 1973 â€“ February 27, 2021) was an American actress, comedian and writer. She is best known for her roles in Precious and Chi-Raq. ==Biography== Watson grew up in Chicago. She attended St. Thomas the Apostle Elementary School and Kenwood High School. She graduated from Columbia College Chicago. She died of complications from COVID-19 in Montego Bay, where she had been living until her death, during the COVID-19 pandemic in Jamaica, one day after her 48th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Jamaica Category:American television actors Category:American television writers Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Screenwriters from Chicago
title: Erica Watson
